name: Dorks
description: A list of commands for searching more efficiently in DuckDuckGo

Dorks.val: Exclude results containing the string. E. g.: San Francisco -california
Search in a given domain. E. g.: First Lady site:whitehouse.gov, site:.uk
Boosts results in a region. E. g.: Football region:uk
Get results that contain the given string on its URL. E. g.: inurl:example.txt
Get results that contain the given string on the title of the website. E. g.: intitle:Important
Seek for specific file extensions. Supported file types are htm / html, pdf, txt, doc / docx, xls / xlsx and ppt / pptx. E. g.: Manual filetype:pdf
I'm Feeling Ducky function. Automatically opens the first result. E. g.: \Pau Gasol

Bangs.val: Triggers a Google search. E. g.: Python !g
Triggers many other searches using DuckDuckGo Bangs.

Instant Answers.val: Shows news linked to the search. E. g.: Lebron James news
Shows map results directly. E. g.: New York map
Calculates the MD5 hash of the following string. E. g.: md5 HelloWorld
Calculates the SHA256 hash of the following string. E. g.: sha256 HelloWorld
There are many others. Try searching for 'Instant Answers' or visiting <https://duck.co/ia>.
